entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
